sru:extraResponseData.fcsm:transformedQuery: SELECT ndx.txt, base.entry, base.sid, COUNT(*) FROM aeb_eng_001__v001 AS base INNER JOIN (SELECT ndx.id, ndx.txt FROM (SELECT tab.id, tab.xpath, tab.txt FROM aeb_eng_001__v001_ndx AS tab INNER JOIN (SELECT inner.id FROM aeb_eng_001__v001_ndx AS `inner` WHERE inner.txt = 'released' AND inner.xpath LIKE '%-change-f-status-') AS prefid ON tab.id = prefid.id WHERE tab.txt != '-') AS ndx WHERE ndx.txt LIKE '%ayy%') AS ndx ON base.id = ndx.id GROUP BY base.sid LIMIT 0, 10

fcsm:ResourceFragment.fcsm:DataView: A Digital Dictionary of Tunis Arabic
A Digital Dictionary of Tunis Arabic

cit.quote: May He (God) let you live.; May He give you a long life.
Er (Gott) lasse dich leben.; Er gebe dir ein langes Leben.
Qu’il (Dieu) te laisse vivre.; Qu’il te donne une longue vie.
May He (God) grant a long life for my son.
Er (Gott) lasse meinen Sohn lange leben.
Que Dieu donne une longue vie à mon fils.

cit.quote: This is a girl, these are girls.
Das ist ein Mädchen, das sind Mädchen.
C’est une fille, ce sont des filles.
